actions.name: Octolock
actions.description:
Effect: The user auto-succeeds on a @Affliction[grapple] Maneuver check against the target on hit. The Target becomes @Affliction[bound] 5. While the target is @Affliction[bound], they lose -1 DEF and SPDEF Stages for 5 Activations at the end of each of their Activations.

If either the @Affliction[grapple] or @Affliction[bound] condition ends, the target loses the other condition.
